name: patrimonio
description: API Rest para o gerenciamento de patrim√¥nio do ICET

scripts.build: cd backend && npx rimraf dist && tsc -p tsconfig-build.json
scripts.knex:migrate:latest: cd backend && npx knex --knexfile src/main/config/knexfile.ts migrate:latest
scripts.knex:seed:up: cd backend && npx knex --knexfile src/main/config/knexfile.ts seed:run
